title: The Darker Side of Money: Trends in Money Laundering
description: MarketWatch financial investigations reporter, Lukas I. Alpert, is joined by Sven Stumbauer, an expert with consultancy Grant Thornton to discuss developments in international crime, sanctions, money laundering and anti-money laundering regulations around the world.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
